description: Retrieves a subset of information about all the allow lists for an account.

nested_items.name: allowLists
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each allow list.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the allow list.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and extended ISO 8601 format, when the allow list was created in Amazon Macie.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The custom description of the allow list.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the allow list.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The custom name of the allow list.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and extended ISO 8601 format, when the allow list's settings were most recently changed in Amazon Macie.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
